text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I take a short break in the<n>trainers' office one late
afternoon,<n>Mejiro Ryan bursts through the door<n>looking
like a sweaty, nervous wreck.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: This is bad... really, really bad!Not even the tastiest protein shake isgonna fix this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mejiro Ryan nervously pulls out a<n>magazine to show me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On the cover, drinking tea while<n>striking an elegant pose, is
Mejiro<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she does... But that's not the<n>issue! Look at this
header on the next<n>page!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: "The Magnificent Maidens of Mejiro,<n>Part One."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: M-magnificent... Maidens...
choice_data_list: Wait, is the second part going to feature...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I just got a call from the<n>magazine... But I'm not like
McQueen<n>at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
They're probably picturing some<n>lovely little lady who plays
violin while<n>longingly looking out the window! Like<n>
McQueen!
choice_data_list: Are you going to say no?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Well...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
You and I have been talking about<n>how I need to try things
I'm not good<n>at...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm still unsure how far my talents<n>go, even after all this
time... But to<n>figure that out, I must open myself up<n>to new
possibilities.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: And to do that, I need your help!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Okay, prepare yourself, Trainer!We're about to explore a worldpreviously known to only McQueenand other elegant folks... Thehigh-class mall.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Victoria, Mademoiselle, Prim & Preen...<n>All of these are super
fancy brands!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
N-no, I don't! Those names are just<n>burned into my mind
after reading that<n>magazine over and over again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um... Do you mind if I take a look?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Feeling the weight of the situation,<n>Mejiro Ryan approaches
the shop.<n>After wavering for a bit, she takes a<n>step inside.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, a tulle skirt?! It's even got a<n>ribbon on the back! Ah,
but...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: M-my thighs are a bit too jacked for<n>this... It'll look weird.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Frilly blouses like this suit McQueen<n>perfectly. If I tried to
wear them...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Gaaah, this is impossible!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This pattern continues for a while.<n>Ryan picks up each piece
of clothing<n>with a smile on her face, only to put it<n>down
again with a dejected look in<n>her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Suddenly, she stops before a knit<n>sweater on display.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: A pink sweater... bejeweled with<n>pearls...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I would never ever picksomething like this normally...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But I gotta push myself! Yeah, just<n>pretend you're pumping
out another<n>set of chest presses... Excuse me,<n>I'd like to
try this on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We finish up our shopping and head<n>home. Despite our
successful trip,<n>Mejiro Ryan still seems antsy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I did it... I bought a pink sweater.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
O-of course! I mean, it's so elegant,<n>so it should work
perfectly for the<n>magazine. But...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
For some reason... that just makes<n>me more nervous. My
heart's beating<n>so hard, my pecs are trembling!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Was that a cat? Where'd it<n>come from?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before us stands one of the many tall<n>trees lining the
streets. However,<n>hanging from this one is a kitten, its<n>
claws caught in the branches.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the blink of an eye, the kitten's<n>claws finally give out, and
it begins to<n>fall. It's at least a thirty meter drop!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I've gotcha, little one!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mejiro Ryan rushes to the kitten,<n>sweater in hand.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Come oooon!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as the kitten is about to hit the<n>ground, Ryan manages
to catch it in<n>her sweater.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Phew... You're safe now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The kitten wiggles around in the<n>sweater, perhaps a little
shaken, but<n>otherwise unharmed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I take the kitten in my arms, and my<n>eyes go wide...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The kitten's claws had clearly gotten<n>caught in the sweater.
It's completely<n>shredded...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: It's weird, but for some reason, I<n>almost feel relieved.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Going shopping at a fancy mall and<n>getting frilly clothes... It
just didn't feel<n>right to me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I think I was trying too hard to be like<n>McQueen. I really
stepped out of my<n>comfort zone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But I realized something while I was<n>running towards that
kitten.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I... am Mejiro Ryan, not MejiroMcQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I think frilly stuff is cute, but it's notME, you know? What is me isdashing in to save a kitten! Nobodycan beat me when it comes to takingaction!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: And... I'm okay with that!
choice_data_list: Sounds like you found another talent.
Sounds like you found another talent.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I sure hope so! And you know... I<n>think I'm gonna do this
photo shoot in<n>my gym clothes!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan beams with pride and<n>confidence. A few days
later, I ask<n>about the interview. She tells me it<n>went off
without a hitch!
